Class TransactionLog

java.lang.Object
com.banksystem.TransactionLog
public class TransactionLog extends Object
Handles logging of all banking transactions. Maintains record of activities in the system and tracks session information.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TransactionLog()
    Creates a new transaction logger.

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionLog

      public TransactionLog()
      Creates a new transaction logger.

  • Method Details

    • recordSessionStart

      public void recordSessionStart(String customerName, List<Account> accounts)
      Records starting balances for a customer's session. Also initializes session transaction tracking for this customer.
      Parameters:
      customerName - the customer's name
      accounts - list of customer's accounts

    • getStartingBalance

      public double getStartingBalance(String customerName, String accountNumber)
      Gets the starting balance for a specific account in the current session.
      Parameters:
      customerName - the customer's name
      accountNumber - the account number
      Returns:
      the starting balance or 0 if not found

    • getCustomerSessionTransactions

      public List<String> getCustomerSessionTransactions(String customerName)
      Gets transactions for a specific customer in the current session only.
      Parameters:
      customerName - the customer's name
      Returns:
      list of session transactions

    • getSessionStartTime

      public LocalDateTime getSessionStartTime()
      Gets the time when the current session started.
      Returns:
      session start time

    • logTransaction

      public void logTransaction(String transaction, String customerName)
      Logs a transaction to both the main log and session-specific log if applicable.
      Parameters:
      transaction - the transaction details to log
      customerName - the customer who performed the transaction

    • exitUpdate

      public void exitUpdate()
      Updates the transaction log file with the current logs and exits.

    • getCustomerTransactions

      public List<String> getCustomerTransactions(String customerName)
      Gets all transactions for a specific customer from the log.
      Parameters:
      customerName - name of the customer
      Returns:
      list of transactions involving this customer
